activities:
Please see the section titled "Information we collect and how we use it" at http://www.instantis.com/privacy.html.
Summary: A person from EU or Switzerland may choose to contact Instantis for pre-sales, partnership, job applications and other such purposes, or choose to respond to Surveys, Research, Special offers, etc. from Instantis which will be accompanied by an opt-out information to unsubscribe. Instantis also may use such information for account creation, billing and support.
If a customer chooses to use Instantis' Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) offering, the customer chooses what information to put in the applications hosted in our servers per the policies that Customer is governed by. Instantis does not disseminate this information to third parties; it uses the information, per agreement with the customer, to offer support for running the SaaS application.

recoursemech: Instantis commits to cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
